statements: UPDATE energy_consumption_data SET energy_reading = 100 WHERE timestamp = '2022-06-15 12:00:00';

UPDATE EnergyConsumption SET energy_consumed = 150 WHERE id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'

UPDATE EnergyConsumptionData SET energy_usage = 15.5 WHERE device_id = 101 AND timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:00:00';
